text:
I took a look at the Google Chrome Store dashboard for the extension today to see what it said about how many users we have using Mac vs PC. 

It appears HubSpot devs are mostly Mac users.
37 Mac users
15 Windows users

kinda makes the cursor fix feel more urgent. I may release a small update to the extension in the chrome store to allow the cursor fix through while weâ€™re still working on the rest of the features.
